Package com.ae2dms.GameState

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.GameState.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object

The Class GameEngine defines the gameEngine of the game. GameEngine defines the fields of gameEngine and contains some methods that manipulate the gameEngine.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yixin SHEN
date
2020/11/30-20:22

    • handleKey

      public void handleKey​(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode code) throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException, java.io.IOException
      Call the move method according to the keyboard input.

      EventFilter set in the gameGontroller class, get the keyCode input by keyboard. Change the moveDirection to different value used to determine the keeper img.

      Parameters:
      code - The keyboard input.
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - CloneNotSupportedException
      java.io.IOException - IOException
      date
      2020/11/30-20:57

    • move

      private void move​(java.awt.Point delta) throws java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
      The keeper move method.

      According to delta and current keeper position, judge whether it can be moved; if the movement is successful, update the position of keeper/crate; save the keeperTrack and the gameGridsTrack

      Parameters:
      delta - the keeper move case in the Point format.
      Throws:
      java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException - CloneNotSupportedException
      date
      2020/11/13-16:52

    • loadGameFile

      private java.util.List<Level> loadGameFile​(java.io.InputStream input)
      Load the game archive file to generate level array list.

      input a .sdk file and read the input stream, generate a level array list, contains the level details

      Parameters:
      input - file in .sdk format, which contains the map
      Returns:
      java.util.List The level of this gameEngine.
      date
      2020/11/12-13:43
